actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management and Specialty Crops.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Risk Management and Specialty Crops

official_title: To amend the Commodity Exchange Act to provide for the regulation of contracts for the purchase or sale of a commodity for future delivery, which are made on or subject to the rules of a board of trade, exchange, or market located outside the United States, when the commodity is deliverable in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to provide for the regulation of foreign futures contracts deliverable in the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Commodity Exchange Act to provide for the regulation of contracts for the purchase or sale of a commodity for future delivery, which are made on or subject to the rules of a board of trade, exchange, or market located outside the United States, when the commodity is deliverable in the United States.
